ygData.subject: Re: Mail Runs and a L50 (SPOILER)
ygData.msgSnippet: The concept of an intelligence network run by the Antonican Bards has some good potential for a long series of quests, IMHO. Hopefully, Verant will take this
ygData.messageBody:
The concept of an "intelligence network" run by the Antonican Bards has some
good potential for a long series of quests, IMHO. Hopefully, Verant will
take this beyond the "FedEx" level.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Rebecca Small [mailto:macha_nabaob@...]
> My guild is on new bard watch for me now, and they reported a
> bard in Halas bank.

Asking Ton Twostring (Freeport) about "agents" will get you a list of names
of agents who report to Felisity Starbright (Freeport). If you ask Felisity
about each of those agents by name, she'll tell you where they are. Here are
her answers:

Dark Deathsinger - Innothule
Silna Songsmith - Rivervale
Travis Two-Tone - Nektulos
Drizda Tunesinger - The Ferrot

Mannerism (on The Rathe)
